full_summary:
# Technology Architect Contract
## Solicitation Information:
* Reference Number: CB-4702-78248094
* Solicitation Number: W6431-230107
* Publication Date: 12 April 2023
* Tender Closing Date: 3 May 2023 14:00 ET

## Contract Information:
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
* Address: 15 Anson Ave, Bldg 518, Astra, ON K0K 3W0
* Contact Information:
  * Leanne Cooper (613) 392-2811 | cleanse.cooper@forces.gc.ca

## Procurement Details:
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Scope of Work:
The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks the services of a Technology Architect to support the Exercise and Simulation Branch of the RCAF Aerospace Warfare Centre. The contractor will integrate Command, Control, Communications, Computers, Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (C4ISR) simulation systems.

Key Requirements:

* The Technology Architect will work on-site, with the possibility of remote work at the discretion of the technical authority.
* The contractor will not replace the current in-house expertise.

## Trade Agreements:
This procurement is open to bidders from Canada and partner countries covered by the following free trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Tender Documents:
Tender documents are available for download at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

## Notes:
This solicitation is for contracting services only; no single-source contract will be awarded.
